favourite.article: Amen on this for singing as round song.
Oh our Love! Amen!!! Come Lord Jesus!
Amen! Jesus won't You come! We long that Your heart's desire would be satisfied.
Praise the Lord,brothers and sisters! The Lord is coming back soon.We as the young people should not delay His return.We should exercise our spirit more and be His overcomers!
Even though we are sinners the Lord is coming! We are His Bride, and waiting for Him our Bridegroom to come! We shall be His expression as His glory!! HALLEJUAH! AMEN!!!
